settings.mastheadSubTitle: Make it full-length, give it an overlay, show or hide the title, and reverse the order, use an image or a video for the background.

settings.contentBodyOne: Integer ac metus check it out arcu interdum aliquizzle. Quisque posuere. Dawg ass mofo. Dizzle leo pede, check it out izzle, condimentum izzle, phat shiznit, check it out. Vestibulizzle feugiat. Ut vehicula ultricies fo shizzle my nizzle.

settings.title: Refreshing Banter
settings.body: Live, Laugh, Love your way to coffee every 2 weeks without any human intervention whatsoever!

settings.title: Pod it up
settings.body: Stop grinding beans or measuring out ground coffee like a bi-atch! Get our lovely pods and pop them into your Grind One for maximum efficiency.

settings.title: ROCK SOLID
settings.body: Made with the finest materials, these pods are nice and hard without being terrible for the environment. Stick that in your vape and smoke it!

settings.title: Wow, beautiful sunsets.
settings.body: Life is so hectic, we never really take the time to sit back and enjoy a sunset. Sad isn't it?!

settings.title: Refreshingly Light
settings.body: Wow I made a pun on a refresh icon! Funny right?!!!?!?!?!

settings.title: Pods Galore
settings.body: You can add as many or as few of these as you like now. Life is freedom!

settings.title: Hello Anchor
settings.body: Hello we've got some text here! Dunno why this damn anchor is overflowing like this it's a bit weird tbh...

settings.iconSubtitle: You can change the icon sizes between 16px and 100px.
You can add up to four icon blocks to this block.
You can change the image on the left. You can't change the background colour.

settings.title: Four Icon Layout
settings.body: These is a comparison of Grind coffee, but very rough content. There’s no wrong decision really. Just go with your heart.

settings.title: Title Text
settings.content: You can change the background colour of the circles behind the icons, or you can keep it translucent.

settings.title: Title Two
settings.content: The second card will be on top and in the middle. The text needs to be fairly even on the cards to format this correctly.

settings.title: Title Three
settings.content: You can add up to three cards. The images will resize when you add the coloured background.

settings.title: Title One
settings.content: This block is called 2021 Comparison CTA 4x.

settings.title: Title Two
settings.content: You can change the icons and the coloured background.

settings.title: Title Three
settings.content: If there is no background, the icons will be larger.

settings.title: Title Four
settings.content: If there are fewer than 4 cards, the content will be left-aligned.

settings.title: Icon Point One
settings.body: You can add icon points, but if you don't add any then this section will be blank.

settings.title: Icon Point Two
settings.body: Environmentally friendly, organic and high-grade. Grind Pods are not only the superior choice to Nespresso

settings.title: Icon Point Three
settings.body: You can add as many icon points as you like.

settings.title: This block is called Pros and Cons 2021
Pros will go in the top section
An image needs to be added to the block to appear on the right
Cons will appear in the bottom section
Here is a con with a red cross
A con with a red pound sign.
If not enough are added, the image will be cut off

settings.bodyText: Environmentally friendly, organic and high-grade. Grind Pods are not only the superior choice to Nespresso, they’re cheaper and guaranteed compatible with any Nespresso Pod coffee machine.

settings.quote: Add up to 4 testimonials. The block will resize based on text length. Add an image on the right or have the testimonials full-width.
